product_name: The North Face Canyonlands Full Zip Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Built to battle wind and cold while you work a route, The North Face Canyonlands full-zip fleece jacket has an abrasion-resistant exterior and cozy interior to keep you warm on the rock, or elsewhere. Hard-face stretch fleece resists abrasion while staying soft on the inside. Stretch cuffs with thumbholes keep sleeves in place while you reach for the next handhold. Side and underarm gussets ensure the jacket stays in place through your full range of motion. Full-face protective hood; durable full-length Vislon zipper; harness-compatible hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Built to battle wind and cold while you work a route, The North Face Canyonlands full-zip fleece jacket has an abrasion-resistant exterior and cozy interior to keep you warm on the rock, or elsewhere.
